name: Christmas Leave
description:
Mid-December, 1915.

RFC pilot Malcolm is on his way home on leave. With him is his sometimes-lover, a joker named Julia. Join Malcolm as he attempts to make his true feelings clear.

Inspired by bizarro dating sims such as Hatoful boyfriend and PacaPlus, the Biggles book series, and multiple narratives of female soldiers.

Made for Visual Novel Jam 2022

Credits: 

Character art, programming and writing -Tristan de l'Arkadien

Composer - 3N
